# JsonWebServiceRequest&lt;TResponseValue&gt;.GetResponse method

Gets the response.

```csharp
public JsonWebServiceResponse<TResponseValue> GetResponse(CancellationToken cancellationToken = default(CancellationToken))
```

## Return Value

Makes a web request, blocking until the request has returned a response.
